Package org.actioncontroller.client

Interface ApiClientExchange

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FakeApiClient.FakeApiClientExchange, HttpURLConnectionApiClient.ClientExchange
    public interface ApiClientExchange
    Abstracts a HTTP request and response from the client perspective. Can be implemented with various HTTP clients and with fake Servlet classes.

    Usage example

     exchange.setTarget("GET", "/index");
 exchange.setRequestParameter("foo", "bar");

 exchange.execute();

 exchange.getResponseBody()

      • setRequestParameter

        void setRequestParameter​(String name,
                         Object value)
        Sets the specified HTTP request parameter to be included in URL query (for GET requests) or application/x-www-form-urlencoded body (for other request methods).
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the HTTP request parameter to set
        value - If null or Optional.empty, parameter will be unset; if Optional, value will be extracted

      • addRequestCookie

        void addRequestCookie​(String name,
                      Object value)
        Sets the specified HTTP cookie value
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the HTTP cookie to set
        value - If null or Optional.empty, cookie will be unset; if Optional, value will be extracted
